name: Harvest Mania
description:
Harvest Mania!

This game is simple and straight forward, plant your vegetables, grab the pollen and keep farming as much as possible during one day!

But don't forget, the vegetable might die if you forget to grab the pollen!

Each vegetable can be sold if you decide to harvest for money or simply cant keep up with relieving the vegetable from it's pollen.

Get as much money as possible!

Ps, my first Ludum Dare. Wish me luck :)
